(min-width:61.25em){.wbl__wrapper{height:320px}}</style><div class='wbl__content'>

    <div class="this_wide_brown_land">
        <a href='https://www.theguardian.com/environment/series/our-wide-brown-land'>
            <span>Help shine the spotlight on Australia’s</span>
            <br><span>neglected environmental issues</span></a>
    </div>
    
    <div class="fc-container__description">
        Our fragile environment is under attack. Thanks to our readers, we’ve reached our original target but with more funding, we can do even more. Help to fund our reporting on these most important issues and move them up the public agenda
    </div>
    
    <div class='wbl__goal'>
        <span class='wbl__count'>$0</span>
        <span class='wbl__count-label'>pledged so far</span>
        <div class='wbl__progress'>
            <div class='wbl__filled-progress'></div>
            <div class='wbl__filled-middle'></div>
        </div>
        <div class='wbl__progress-labels'>
            <span class='wbl__label wbl__label--first'>$0</span>
            <span class='wbl__label wbl__label--middle'></span>
            <span class='wbl__label wbl__label--goal'></span>
        </div>
    </div>

    <a href='https://contribute.theguardian.com/?acquisitionData=%7B%22componentType%22%3A%22ACQUISITIONS_THRASHER%22%2C%22source%22%3A%22GUARDIAN_WEB%22%2C%22campaignCode%22%3A%22aus_environment_campaign_2018%22%2C%22componentId%22%3A%22gdnwb_thrasher_aus_environment_campaign_2018%22%7D&INTCMP=aus_environment_campaign_2018' class='wbl__button js-acquisition-link'>Make a contribution<svg class="wbl__icon" width="17" height="16" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill="#fff" d="M16.82 7.63L9.2 0l-.72.7 5.5 6.57H0v1.46h13.97l-5.5 6.56.73.7 7.62-7.63v-.74"></path></svg></a>
</div>

trailText: Support our new series that shines the spotlight on Australia’s neglected environmental issues
